selectStatements.query:
SELECT 
'COST ORG COST BOOK' AS driving_dim_code,
b.organization_name || ' | '|| a.cost_book_code  AS dimension_value,
TO_CHAR(b.organization_id) || ' | '|| a.cost_book_code  AS dimension_value_code
FROM DW_CST_COST_ORG_BOOKS_D a,
DW_INTERNAL_ORG_D_TL b
WHERE a.cost_org_id = b.organization_id
AND b.language = 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.USER_LANGUAGE_CODE)'
